author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> Replacing oidc with a signature has been a hot topic of debate recently. ideally the signature of your entropy as this would allow for only needing a single signature to be generated client side.

While implementing this technically is fairly easy, I am reticent to go down that path as the sequencer and zkparty frontend are post-audit and this would require breaking changes to the api plus big PRs against the codebases.
